item.title: Pachelbel’s Canon (in D) Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords used: D, A, Bm, F#m, G
A version of the song in the original key of D was requested...so here it is!
Tutorial Video in C (GCEA & DGBE): @MK0A
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from @
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit @f
Are you a teacher using ukulele in the classroom? Check out my video based method...effective, easy, and inexpensive! @eo-ukulele-method/
Check out the "merch": @ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Johnny Hates Jazz - Shattered Dreams - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: Em, Bm, C, Am, D, A, Fm, Eb, Bb, C#, Bbm

item.title: Panic! At The Disco - Into The Unknown
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords Used: G, D, Bm, Dm, C, F, Dm7, A, D, E, C#m, Cm, Bb
As performed by PANIC! AT THE DISCO, as featured in Disney's FROZEN II
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/YEm7Bj0L1eM

item.title: Ella Fitzgerald - Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas - Key of G
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas - Ella Fitzgerald version
Using the chords: A7 Am B7 Bm C D D7 E7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Saxophone Dreamsound - Driving Home for Christmas - Key of A
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Driving Home For Christmas - Chris Rea
Using the chords: A Bm C#m7 D E7 Em F#m G I have simplified the chords to make the song accessible to more players. If you would prefer, you can replae the E7 chord tih an E and the C#m7 chord with a C#m.
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
